sentences.en: An abrupt change of location can be disorienting.
sentences.cn: 地点的突然改变会令人迷失方向。

sentences.en: Cross was a little taken aback by her abrupt manner.
sentences.cn: 她鲁莽的态度让克罗斯感到有点吃惊。

sentences.en: Excuse me for my abrupt questions.
sentences.cn: 恕我冒昧提出这些问题.

sentences.en: Have you ever seen such abrupt rocks?

sentences.en: He was abrupt to the point of rudeness.
sentences.cn: 他的唐突已到了无礼的地步。

sentences.en: His abrupt change of subject left her floundering helplessly.
sentences.cn: 他突然改变话题，使她茫然不知所措。

sentences.en: His abrupt reply hurt our feelings.
sentences.cn: 他粗鲁的回答伤了我们的感情.

sentences.en: I don't know the cause of his abrupt leave.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他突然离去的原因.

sentences.en: Mullins knocked me off-balance with his abrupt change of subject.
sentences.cn: 马林斯突然改变话题，这让我措手不及。

sentences.en: Rosie's idyllic world came to an abrupt end when her parents' marriage broke up.
sentences.cn: 父母婚姻的破裂使得罗茜田园诗般美好的世界陡然画上了句号。

sentences.en: She always sounds abrupt on the telephone.
sentences.cn: 在电话中听起来她总像很无礼.

sentences.en: The river takes an abrupt bend to the west.
The road makes several abrupt turnings.
